landing.bio:
Hey there! üëã 
		I am Tharunya, a hackathon enthusiast and a Sophomore student pursuing Computer Science Engineering with specialization in Artificial Intelligence. Learning new techs, thinking of an effective problem-solving approach, making fun graphics are a few things that gets me hyped. As a Core member at @DSC-SIST and @HackClub-SIST, I aim to promote diversity in tech and as #IamRemarkable Facilitator encourage women and underrepresented groups to speak openly about their accomplishments in the workplace and beyond, thereby breaking modesty norms and glass ceilings. Oh, and I love meeting amazing people! Lets Connect.

experience.aboutWork: Maintain and manage the community documentation and ideate events
Collaborated on open-source project ‚Äì ‚ÄúEvent Aggregator‚Äù for our college using Yii2 Framework
Raahee is a mental health application that provides affordable therapy and I work on the creative and Designing team for the company.
Working under the organization Jina AI to develop a Product Look-Alike Search Engine using Jina for the backend which is a neural search framework.

#IamRemarkable is a Google initiative empowering women and other underrepresented groups to celebrate their achievements in the workplace and beyond, thereby breaking modesty norms and glass ceilings. As a Facilitator, my role involves hosting workshops and being an ambassador for #IamRemarkable within my personal and professional networks.
Responsible for the organisation's graphics, designing aspects. Assist in organizing events and hackathons.

education.university: Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering- Computer Science Engineering with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

awards.awardDetail: Best UI/UX Design Winner at HackRU Spring 2021
Winner in the Peace-a-Thon Track of Global CyberPeace Challenge 3.0
